import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Paginator=_ref=>{let{page,pagesArray,totalPages,setPage}=_ref;const getPagesToShow=()=>{const range=2;// количество соседних страниц до и после текущей
const start=Math.max(1,page-range);const end=Math.min(totalPages,page+range);const pages=[];for(let i=start;i<=end;i++){pages.push(i);}return pages;};const pagesToShow=getPagesToShow();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{"aria-label":"...",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:page===1?"page-item disabled":"page-item",onClick:page===1?null:()=>setPage(page-1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"page-link",children:"\u041F\u0440\u043E\u0448\u043B\u0430\u044F"})}),pagesToShow.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:page===p?"page-item active":"page-item",onClick:()=>setPage(p),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"page-link",children:p})},p)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:page===totalPages?"page-item disabled":"page-item",onClick:page===totalPages?null:()=>setPage(page+1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"page-link",children:"\u0421\u043B\u0435\u0434\u0443\u044E\u0449\u0430\u044F"})})]})});};export default Paginator;
